name: Make Mush-Room for Me
description:
In a strange world where you are trapped inside a ring, you must fend off the non-stop hoard of mushrooms looking to enter your precious bubble of personal space as you try and collect as many colorful loops as possible. Defend yourself by creating a stash of different weapons and cycling through them.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47 by MiltonNH, Choco, and XanderT
